name: ConditionalFormat
description: An object encapsulating a conditional format's range, format, rule, and other properties.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The Priority of the Conditional Format within the current ConditionalFormatCollection.

properties.name: stopIfTrue
properties.description: If the conditions of this conditional format are met, no lower-priority formats shall take effect on that cell.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: The priority (or index) within the conditional format collection that this conditional format currently exists in. Changing this also

properties.name: type
properties.description: A type of conditional format. Only one can be set at a time.

properties.name: dataBar
properties.description: Returns the data bar properties if the current conditional format is a data bar.

properties.name: dataBarOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the data bar properties if the current conditional format is a data bar.

properties.name: custom
properties.description: Returns the custom conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a custom type.

properties.name: customOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the custom conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a custom type.

properties.name: iconSet
properties.description: Returns the IconSet conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an IconSet type.

properties.name: iconSetOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the IconSet conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an IconSet type.

properties.name: colorScale
properties.description: Returns the ColorScale conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an ColorScale type.

properties.name: colorScaleOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the ColorScale conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an ColorScale type.

properties.name: topBottom
properties.description: Returns the TopBottom conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an TopBottom type.

properties.name: topBottomOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the TopBottom conditional format properties if the current conditional format is an TopBottom type.

properties.name: preset
properties.description: Returns the preset criteria conditional format.

properties.name: presetOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the preset criteria conditional format.

properties.name: textComparison
properties.description: Returns the specific text conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a text type.

properties.name: textComparisonOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the specific text conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a text type.

properties.name: cellValue
properties.description: Returns the cell value conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a CellValue type.

properties.name: cellValueOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the cell value conditional format properties if the current conditional format is a CellValue type.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range the conditonal format is applied to. Throws an error if the conditional format is applied to multiple ranges. Read-only.

methods.name: getRangeOrNullObject
methods.description: Returns the range the conditonal format is applied to, or a null object if the conditional format is applied to multiple ranges. Read-only.

methods.name: getRanges
methods.description: Returns the RangeAreas, comprising one or more rectangular ranges, the conditonal format is applied to. Read-only.
